thread.section_title: LigaProBrasil.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LigaProBrasil.com | ligaprobrasil.com
thread.title: DG

author: DG
title: DG
text:
I have used LigaProBrasil many times to refill my Brazil telephones. At my last refill order, the Brazilian phone company was having technical trouble and could not accept the refill order. Even though a charge to my account was initiated when the refill order/request was sent, LigaProBrasil removed the charge without my having to request that the unfulfilled order could not be effected.
In more simple language, this company is efficient and honest. What more can one hope for nowadays?
Job well done.
